name: deribit-api-docs-extractor
description: Extract and convert Deribit API documentation to Markdown with configurable sections

scripts.all: npm run extract:general && npm run extract:session_management && npm run extract:authentication && npm run extract:market_data && npm run extract:private_account_management && npm run extract:private_wallet && npm run extract:private_trading && npm run extract:private_block_trading && npm run extract:private_combo_trading && npm run extract:private_block_rfq && npm run extract:connection
